head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LANGSAN, IRA N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LANGSAN, IRA N.

block.p: LANGSAN-Ira N. On September 22, 2000, at age 88. Beloved husband of Lillian Lichtman Langsan. Loving father of Susan Langsan Black and Nancy Langsan. Adored grandfather of Ariana Ciri Bernstein. Dear brother of Marion Langsan Katz. Services at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave., at 81st St., Monday, September 25, 1:30 PM.

LANGSAN-Ira N. On September 22, 2000, at age 88. Beloved husband of Lillian Lichtman Langsan. Loving father of Susan Langsan Black and Nancy Langsan. Adored grandfather of Ariana Ciri Bernstein. Dear brother of Marion Langsan Katz. Services at Frank E. Campbell, 1076 Madison Ave., at 81st St., Monday, September 25, 1:30 PM.
